body.p:
includes a few built-in transformation scenarios that allow you to transform Ant build files. They are listed in the Ant section in the Configure Transformation Scenario(s) dialog box:
ANT - This transformation scenario runs as an external process that executes the Ant build script with the built-in Ant distribution (Apache Ant version ) that is included with , or optionally with a custom Ant distribution configured in the scenario.
ANT (with Saxon 9 EE XSLT support) - This transformation scenario allows Ant XSLT tasks to be performed using Saxon 9 JAR libraries that come bundled with and all defined XML catalogs are also taken into account during the transformation.
